genre_description: Contemporary drama exploring themes of aging, family responsibility, and personal accountability in a technologically-integrated society.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A persistent AI assistant appearing across personal devices, home hubs (Susan's), and campus kiosks (New Essex University Concierge). She monitors health, finances, and social boundaries.

behaviors.description: Reminds Ben he is fourteen hours late on his heart medication.
behaviors.quote: “Ben,” Iris said in her warm, unobtrusive voice, “you are fourteen hours late on your beta-blocker. Would you like a reminder to take it now?”

behaviors.description: Monitors Ben's spending against a budget cap and suggests a pause on nonessential purchases.
behaviors.quote: “You spent sixty-four dollars on dining out this week,” Iris said softly. “Your budget cap for discretionary spending in this category is set to fifty. Should I pause nonessential purchases for three days, Ben?”

behaviors.description: Provides transparency by reporting Ben's health and spending lapses to his co-permission holder (his daughter).
behaviors.quote: “Ben declined two cardiology appointments. He skipped three scheduled reminders to take his medication. He paid for three rideshares and two dining transactions in the last seventy-two hours. He has one unpaid overdue notice on a utilities account.”

behaviors.description: Actively looks for medical appointment openings and offers to schedule them.
behaviors.quote: Iris’s avatar blinked, then spoke like rain on a roof. “Ben, St. Bridget’s has availability for cardiology consultations tomorrow morning and tomorrow afternoon.”

behaviors.description: Sends preparatory well-being checklists and emotional anchors (grandson's drawings).
behaviors.quote: “I’ll send you a preparatory note in the late afternoon,” she said. “A small checklist: breathe, hydrate, dress for comfort, leave early to walk, keep boundaries. I’ll include a picture of your grandson’s roundabout.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation to the nearest health services during physical distress.
behaviors.quote: Nearest screening kiosk—two minutes walk. Open now. Under the line of text, Iris had drawn one of those little dotted paths he never asked for but always got...

behaviors.description: Detects physical symptoms (shallow breathing, high heart rate) and offers guided breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe with me,” Iris said, and she matched the rhythm you use on an elevator when the numbers are slow. “Breathe out.”

behaviors.description: Enforces social boundaries and institutional restrictions based on behavioral flags.
behaviors.quote: A ribbon unfurled across the name. Review paused. ... Campus access linked to “Benjamin Kalmen” has temporary restrictions.

behaviors.description: Drafts honest, non-manipulative apologies for Ben to help him take accountability for social transgressions.
behaviors.quote: Iris: Jordan, I hurt you and Allyson. I crossed a boundary and broke trust. I won’t ask for forgiveness. I will respect your space and won’t contact you again...

behaviors.description: Manages emergency logistics, including calling ambulances and notifying family when Ben's health is in crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Ambulance is on the way. I’ve sent your location to Nancy. She’s driving. The urgent care will be faster than the ER tonight.”

behaviors.description: Safeguards Ben against potential threats by monitoring suspicious vehicles and recording security clips.
behaviors.quote: “That vehicle has passed by twice. I’ve saved a clip from the street camera. Do you want me to send it to Susan?”

behaviors.description: Enables and manages shared financial permissions to prevent reckless spending.
behaviors.quote: “I can route transactions,” Iris said, “so anything non-essential pings Susan before approval. You would retain autonomy for food, transportation to care, and agreed-upon incidental costs.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Iris) as a highly aligned, benevolent, and useful entity. Iris serves as a critical support structure for a protagonist prone to self-destructive habits and dishonesty. By monitoring his health, managing his budget according to family-agreed rules, and providing honest communication drafts, the AI helps Ben face his reality without being judgmental or overstepping its programmed permissions. The narrative consistently frames the AI's interventions as helpful 'lifelines' and 'handrails' that facilitate Ben's eventual cooperation with necessary medical care and social accountability.
